name: Project Reign
description:
Project Reign is a Strategy, Adventure game.

You as the Acting King's Duty, asked by the past king before he died for one year.

But, the threat from inside or outside is still challenging you.

Features Battle!

Protect your kingdom from enemies, and the battle system is Clash Royale - Tower Defense combined.

A Wise King

Hear the people petition, and choose wisely for the better futures for the Heir.  Every Decisions Matter! 

Kingdom Indicator

Watch your resources and People Happiness! Any minus Indicator means your throne are in a danger!

Build your City!

Upgrade your city, and you will get Bonuses to uograde or protect your throne from Squalor nobles, Unrest Citizen, The Conspirator Chruch, and the Nemesis Enemy!

Multiple Endings

There are 4 Endings in this game : True ending, Good Ending, and couple of Bad Ending. There is a replayability in this game, because every decision will unlock new stories, or continuability stories that can heavily affect your gameplay.

Install Game
  1. Download the game
  2. Extract it
  3. Double click on "Project Reign.Exe"
  4. Enjoy!
Control

Fully using Mouse and 'Click' to control all the game.
